tool.name: OGS: ResetPropertiesInPolygonalRegion
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'ResetPropertiesInPolygonalRegion'.
tool.command: if [ "$geometry" != "None" ] && [ ! -e '${$geometry.element_identifier}' ]; then ln -s '$geometry' '${$geometry.element_identifier}'; fi; if [ "$mesh_input_file" != "None" ] && [ ! -e '${$mesh_input_file.element_identifier}' ]; then ln -s '$mesh_input_file' '${$mesh_input_file.element_identifier}'; fi; if [ "$gmsh_path" != "None" ] && [ ! -e '${$gmsh_path.element_identifier}' ]; then ln -s '$gmsh_path' '${$gmsh_path.element_identifier}'; fi; ResetPropertiesInPolygonalRegion --polygon-name '$polygon_name' --geometry '$geometry.element_identifier' $any_of #if str($char_property_value).strip() != 'None' and str($char_property_value).strip() != '': --char-property-value '$char_property_value' #end if #if str($int_property_value).strip() != 'None' and str($int_property_value).strip() != '': --int-property-value '$int_property_value' #end if #if str($property_name).strip() != 'None' and str($property_name).strip() != '': --property-name '$property_name' #end if #if str($restrict_to_MaterialID).strip() != 'None' and str($restrict_to_MaterialID).strip() != '': --restrict-to-MaterialID '$restrict_to_MaterialID' #end if --mesh-input-file '$mesh_input_file.element_identifier' #if str($gmsh_path).strip() != 'None' and str($gmsh_path).strip() != '': --gmsh-path '$gmsh_path.element_identifier' #end if --mesh-output-file output_1.data

param.name: geometry
param.label: geometry
param.help: Input (.gli | .gml). the file containing the input geometry

param.name: any_of
param.label: any of
param.help: all nodes of an element has to be inside the polygon (default behaviour without switch) or any node of an element has to be inside (switch is given)

param.name: restrict_to_MaterialID
param.label: restrict to MaterialID
param.help: Restrict resetting the property to the material id

param.name: mesh_input_file
param.label: mesh input file
param.help: Input (.vtu | .vtk | .msh). the file containing the input mesh

param.name: gmsh_path
param.label: gmsh path
param.help: Input (.msh). The path to the input binary

tool.help: This tool runs the **ResetPropertiesInPolygonalRegion** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
